title.rendered: ARTICLE: A brokerage in the ‘people business’ [Mortgage Broker News, APRIL 2022]

content.rendered:
Mortgages may often be numbers-driven; however, for Vine Group, the real ‘heart’ of the mortgage process lies in getting to know the client and focusing on what the client needs. 

 

Vine Group’s Hugo Dos Reis, Paul Clara, Preet Singh, and Richard Tartaglia are featured in this month’s CMP Magazine discussing broker perspectives and how Vine Group has led some of the top brokers in the industry through its doors. 

 

“I was drawn to all the things that come with Vine. The leadership that exists at Vine with the founders, as well as the HUB that we have, helps me scale my business,” – Paul Clara, Vine Group

 

“Looking ahead three to five years, we would like to see one in ten Canadians getting their mortgage from Vine Group.” – Hugo Dos Reis, Vine Group

 

Read the full article here.
